articles.description: BLACKPINK’s Rosé has returned with an emotional new music video! On April 5 at midnight KST, Rosé released her music video for “GONE,” the B-side from her first solo single album “R.” In contrast to the bold, confident energy of her title track “On The Ground…

articles.author: Kevin Kayhart
articles.title: Zendaya to voice the role of Lola Bunny in film Space Jam: A New Legacy starring LeBron James - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Euphoria star will voice the role of the iconic character, Lola Bunny, in the sequel to the 1996 sports comedy film that starred basketball legend Michael Jordan.
articles.content:
Zendaya has joined the cast of the upcoming movie Space Jam: A New Legacy.
